translation.Message_0_Page_0: My name is <name_npc>. I'm the best chef in France.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: I cooked for tourists, political figures, and CEOs.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: Then everyone turned green. I decided I was best on this boat with soldiers that came by.
translation.Message_0_Page_3: Now I cook the best food in France, because I'm the only chef.
